meanings.definition: The quality of being prestigious or having high status.
meanings.sent1: Her prestigiousnesses in the community made her a respected leader.
meanings.sent2: The prestigiousnesses of the award ceremony attracted many influential guests.
meanings.sent3: Despite his humorous nature, his prestigiousnesses in the workplace were undeniable.
meanings.sent4: The prestigiousnesses of the ancient castle echoed through the halls.
meanings.sent5: The prestigiousnesses of the event left a lasting impression on all attendees.

meanings.definition: The state of being esteemed or respected.
meanings.sent1: The prestigiousnesses of the professor were well-deserved.
meanings.sent2: She carried herself with the prestigiousnesses of a queen.
meanings.sent3: The cat demanded prestigiousnesses from its owner, expecting royal treatment.
meanings.sent4: His prestigiousnesses shone brightly in the eyes of his peers.
meanings.sent5: The prestigiousnesses of the tradition were upheld by the community.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being prestigious or having a good reputation.
meanings.sent1: The company's prestigiousnesses attracted top talent.
meanings.sent2: His prestigiousnesses in the field of medicine were widely recognized.
meanings.sent3: The dog's prestigiousnesses among the neighborhood pets was evident.
meanings.sent4: The prestigiousnesses of the brand were unmatched in the market.
meanings.sent5: She exuded prestigiousnesses wherever she went.
